NomaiObject:
Clue: Supernova generate lots of heat
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
CYCAD: Here is the additional shipment of ore you requested from <color=orange>mining site 2b,</color> Root!
2
1
ROOT: You have our gratitude, Cycad. We are truly sorry to have troubled you with this last, unforeseen delivery!
3
2
CYCAD: It is no trouble, friend.
4
3
CYCAD: However, we are curious why the Volcanic Testing Site needed so much more ore suddenly!
5
4
CYCAD: (To be specific, Coleus wished to inquire, so that we may have an estimate if any additional ore is needed.)
6
5
ROOT: Ah, that would be for the construction of the new <color=orange>Quantum Weather Lab,</color> Cycad. You may have caught a glimpse of it on your way to <color=lightblue>Hollow's Lantern!</color>
7
6
CYCAD: Caught a glimpse? Does this <color=orange>Quantum Weather Lab</color> exist in quantum superposition around <color=lightblue>Hollow's Lantern?</color>
8
7
ROOT: No, no, my friend! The <color=orange>Quantum Weather Lab</color> was given its name, because it was built to study how meteors launched from <color=lightblue>Hollow's Lantern</color> are affected as the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> orbits <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow.</color>
9
8
ROOT: Due to its artificial, stationary orbit around <color=lightblue>Hollow's Lantern,</color> it is often cloaked in shadow behind <color=lightblue>Hollow's Lantern</color> or <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow,</color> thus making it difficult to see normally.
10
9
ROOT: We will be using this ore to build a protective shell that will protect the station's interior from meteor impacts, which it will doubtless need to weather often.
11
10
CYCAD: What an exciting project! I look forward to visiting this <color=orange>Quantum Weather Lab</color> to learn more once its construction is complete, my friend.
LV R3 5
